      refresh - - boolean value saying if constant should be refreshed
      Throws:

    • popColumn

      public double[][] popColumn(int colNumber)
      Pops column from matrix and returns it
      Parameters:
      colNumber - - number of column to pop - invalid input: '<'0;length)
      Returns:
      double[][] - popped column
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when matrix is empty or given number exceeds matrix shape

    • popRow

      public double[][] popRow(int rowNumber)
      Pops row from matrix and returns it
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - - number of row to pop - invalid input: '<'0;height)
      Returns:
      double[][] - popped row
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when matrix is empty or row number exceeds matrix shape
